Package bto.Controller

package bto.Controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    bto
     
    bto.Data

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ApplicantController
    Controller class for managing applicant-related operations, such as viewing projects, submitting applications, and handling enquiries.
    AuthController
    Controller class for handling authentication-related operations.
    InitController
    Controller class for initializing the application by reading data from CSV files.
    ManagerController
    Controller class for managing operations related to managers, such as creating, editing, and deleting projects, handling officer registrations, managing applications, and responding to enquiries.
    OfficerController
    Controller class for managing officer-related operations, such as project registration, application management, and enquiry handling.
    OfficerController.RegistrationStatus
    Represents the registration status of an officer for a project.
